languages.text: On hit with a Shield attack, enemy must succeed at Toughness (+0) test or become Prone

traits.locale_text: On hit with a Shield attack, enemy must succeed at Toughness (+0) test or become Prone

languages.text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по цели с помощью щита, цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer hits the target with a shield, that target must pass a Toughness resistance test or be knocked prone.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişi, kalkanlı bir hedefe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurursa{/g} o hedef {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişi, kalkanlı bir hedefe vurursa o hedef Dayanıklılık direnç testine girmelidir. Aksi takdirde yere devrilir.
Takan kişi, kalkanlı bir hedefe vurursa o hedef {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girmelidir. Aksi takdirde yere devrilir.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}golpea{/g} a un objetivo con un escudo, ese objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} para no ser {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador golpea a un objetivo con un escudo, ese objetivo debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia para no ser derribado.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用盾牌{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用盾牌命中目标时，目标需要进行坚韧抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入倒地状态。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger ein Ziel mit einem Schild {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, muss dieses eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen, sonst wird es {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger ein Ziel mit einem Schild trifft, muss dieses eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit bestehen, sonst wird es hingestreckt.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le porteur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} une cible équipée d'un bouclier, cette dernière doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le porteur touche une cible équipée d'un bouclier, cette dernière doit réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet Paralysie.

languages.text: 使用者がシールドでターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}する場合、そのターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がシールドでターゲットを攻撃する場合、そのターゲットは耐久力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると脆弱化する。
使用者がシールドでターゲットを攻撃する場合、そのターゲットは耐久力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると脆弱化する。

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по цели с помощью щита, цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж совершает попадание по цели с помощью щита, цель выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление и в случае провала оказывается опрокинута.
Когда персонаж совершает попадание по цели с помощью щита, цель выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление и в случае провала оказывается опрокинута.
